data.title: Small Hyundai Cars - The Ultimate Buyers Guide for All Things Hyundai Compact
data.meta_description: Looking for small Hyundai Cars? Find out which is the smallest Hyundai car available in our handy guide. Find the right one that suits you.
data.text:
Advanced Safety Systems

One of the Kona's defining characteristics is its focus on safety. Features like Lane-keeping Assist, Forward Collision-avoidance Assist, and Blind-spot Collision Warning will give you peace of mind.

As a result, its small size doesn't compromise safety. Still, it enhances it by making the car more nimble and easier to control.

Efficient Powertrains

The Kona offers you multiple powertrain options, including petrol, diesel, and electric.

This range of powertrain options allows you to choose the most suitable option for your driving habits and needs.

While the electric variant provides you with an impressive range and fast charging capabilities, emphasising the advantages of a small electric vehicle.

Spacious Interiors

Though compact, the Kona surprises many with its spacious and versatile interior. It provides a comfortable driving experience without sacrificing cargo space. Further to this, it also offers practical solutions like split-folding rear seats - to name one - to maximise room when you need it the most.

Connectivity and Infotainment

The Kona is well-equipped when it comes to technology.

A 7-inch, or even optional 8-inch, touchscreen comes with Apple CarPlay™ and Android Auto® integration - allowing for seamless smartphone connectivity.

This compact SUV even offers you premium sound options and intuitive navigation systems - ensuring that your small car experience doesn't mean compromising on tech amenities.

Stylish Design

The Kona stands out for its bold, modern design.

Its exterior features of sleek lines and vibrant colour options prove that a small car can still make a big statement.

The stylish design extends to the interior, offering high-quality materials and a range of customisable options to suit your exact taste.

Eco-Friendly Options

If reducing your environmental impact is a priority, the Kona Electric offers a compelling package. With zero emissions and excellent fuel efficiency, it's a top choice for eco-conscious buyers. This again underlines the benefits of opting for a small car with electric capabilities.

Hyundai Kona Key Dimensions

Dimension Value Length 4,170 mm Width 1,765 mm Height 1,565 mm Wheelbase 2,600 mm Ground clearance 170 mm Turning radius 5.2 m

Hyundai Kona Overall

By excelling in these key areas, the Hyundai Kona proves that choosing a small car doesn't mean sacrificing features, comfort, or style.

It offers you a comprehensive package that caters to various needs and preferences, making it a compelling choice for those looking to invest in a small yet versatile vehicle.

Hyundai Venue

Even though this model is currently unavailable in the UK, the Hyundai Venue stands out as an exceptional option for those seeking a blend of compact dimensions and versatile utility - and can get their hands on this car.

Its small footprint makes it ideal for city driving, allowing easy parking and manoeuvrability through tight spaces. Despite its compact size, the Venue does not compromise on cabin space, providing ample room for passengers and cargo.

These qualities make it a fantastic choice for urban dwellers who frequently navigate narrow streets and those who require a multipurpose vehicle without the bulk of a larger SUV.

Efficient Powertrain

The Venue has an efficient engine that offers impressive fuel economy, reducing your long-term ownership costs.

Furthermore, its modest horsepower is also more than adequate for city commuting and occasional highway trips.

Advanced Safety Systems

Safety is a high priority in the Venue, with features like Forward Collision-Avoidance Assist, Lane Keeping Assist, and Driver Attention Warning to keep an eye on the road for you at all times.

Connectivity

Keeping connected is easier than ever in the Venue, with standard features like Android Auto® and Apple CarPlay™ compatibility.

Consequently, whether you're navigating through unfamiliar streets - or playing your favourite playlists - the Venue's infotainment system has you covered.

Hyundai Venue Key Dimensions

Dimension Value Length 4,040 mm Width 1,775 mm Height 1,610 mm Wheelbase 2,520 mm Ground clearance 160 mm

Hyundai Venue Overall

By carefully considering these features and the benefits of its compact design, the Hyundai Venue emerges as an excellent choice for anyone looking for an affordable, versatile, and efficient small car.

Hyundai Elantra

The Hyundai Elantra makes a compelling case for those wanting a small car with significant features. It's compact enough for accessible city driving but comes equipped with advanced technology often found in larger, more expensive models.

SmartSense Safety

Equipped with Hyundai’s SmartSense suite of safety features, including Blind-Spot Collision Warning and Smart Cruise Control, you will have extra safety on today's modern roads.

Infotainment Hub

Boasting a touchscreen display that integrates seamlessly with smartphones - allowing for navigation, music streaming, and more - you won't be without connectivity.

Fuel-Efficient Engines

Offering multiple engine options, all designed for optimal fuel efficiency and performance, you will have the option that suits your individual requirements the most.

Premium Interior

The Elantra features a high-quality interior with available leather seats, heating functions, and a spacious layout. Consequently, your comfort level while driving will only be enhanced.

ECO Mode

The available ECO mode adjusts engine and transmission controls for improved fuel efficiency, further increasing your range and fuel efficiency.

Hyundai Elantra Key Dimensions

Dimension Value Length 4,670 mm Width 1,825 mm Height 1,435 mm Wheelbase 2,720 mm Ground clearance 150 mm

Hyundai Veloster

The Hyundai Veloster is for those who crave a more energetic driving experience even though it is no longer in production. While compact, it offers sporty performance and eye-catching design elements that set it apart from other small cars.

Turbocharged Options

The Veloster Turbo offered you a more powerful engine without sacrificing much in terms of fuel efficiency.

Unique Design

When it comes to its design, the three-door layout provides a unique and sporty appearance - setting it apart from the standard compact car.

Loaded with Tech

Features like the 8-inch touchscreen and heads-up display make it a tech lover's dream, all in a small package.

Safety

Despite its sporty nature, the Veloster doesn’t skimp on safety features, including an advanced airbag system and an Electronic Stability Control system to give you the extra level of safety you need.

Customisable

Multiple trim levels and optional packages allow you to customise the Veloster to suit your specific needs and preferences.

Hyundai Veloster Key Dimensions

Dimension Value Length 4,270 mm Width 1,780 mm Height 1,425 mm Wheelbase 2,650 mm Ground clearance 140 mm

Hyundai Nexo

The new Hyundai Nexo is a hydrogen fuel cell vehicle, offering zero-emission driving without compromising on range or performance.

Although more prominent than other entries on this list, it retains a smaller, more manageable footprint than many SUVs.
